game.name: PLAYOVER
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: PLAYOVER is a first-person psychological horror game set in an underground drilling facility. You are sent to investigate missing workers and continue the operation
game.shortDescriptionEn: PLAYOVER is a first-person psychological horror game set in an underground drilling facility. You are sent to investigate missing workers and continue the operation
